dmca.title: [Fwd: [[ABUSE] DMCA Notification; First Follow-up; ramelectronics.net; Polk Audio]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 09, 2006 5:18 PM
To: raul@netenforcers.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Notification; First Follow-up;
ramelectronics.net; Polk Audio]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Notification; First Follow-up;
ramelectronics.net;        Polk Audio
Date: Mon, 9 Jan 2006 17:40:35 -0500
From: Raul Torres <raul@netenforcers.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC: 'Misha Fletcher' <misha@netenforcers.com>





To Whom It May Concern,



This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter sent to your client,
www.ramelectronics.net <http://www.ramelectronics.net/> , asking them to
remove intellectual property belonging to our client, Polk Audio. They have
yet to contact us with their compliance. Please let us know the status of
this so that we may get it resolved as quickly as possible. You may email me
at, Raul@netenforcers.com <mailto:Raul@netenforcers.com>  or contact me by
phone at 954-255-6931 Ext. 308. Thank you.





Sincerely,

Raul Torres
Letter Management
Net Enforcers, Enforcement Team
 <mailto:raul@netenforcers.com> raul@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com

The Online Enforcement Experts......
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and
are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally
privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of
delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission
in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is
strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please
immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and
its attachments, if any.





--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
